stlib.interfaces.moving

Interface MovingObjectIF<T1 extends UnitObjectIF<T2>,T2 extends GeneralTypeIF>

  • Type Parameters:
    T1 - - specifies the type of the 'UnitObjectIF' for this 'MovingObject'
    T2 - - specifies the base type of the 'UnitObjectIF' and the 'MovingObject'

    both types have to be compatible
    All Superinterfaces:
    GeneralTypeIF
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MovingBoolIF, MovingPointIF, MovingRegionIF
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovingBool, MovingObject, MovingPoint, MovingRegion

    public interface MovingObjectIF<T1 extends UnitObjectIF<T2>,T2 extends GeneralTypeIF>
extends GeneralTypeIF
    Interface for all 'MovingObject' classes
    Author:
    Markus Fuessel

      Get the value of this 'MovingObject', a object of type T2, which is defined at the passed instant.

        isDefined, setDefined

    • Method Detail

      • add

        boolean add(T1 newUnit)
        Add/append a new unit to this 'MovingObject' object.
        Only appending is possible, if:
        - the period of the passed unit is right adjacent with the period of the last unit, or
        - the period of the passed unit is greater as the period of the last unit

        If the value of the last unit of this 'MovingObject' is equal to the value of the passed unit and if their periods are adjacent or intersects right, then the period of the last unit will be extended
        Parameters:
        newUnit - - the unit to add/append
        Returns:
        true if the passed unit was added, false otherwise

      • getNoUnits

        int getNoUnits()
        Get the number of units
        Returns:
        number of units

      • getPeriods

        PeriodsIF getPeriods()
        Get the 'Periods' range object, for which this MovingObject is defined.
        Returns:
        periods, a range object

      • getUnits

        java.util.List<T1> getUnits()
        Returns:

      • getValue

        T2 getValue(TimeInstantIF instant)
        Get the value of this 'MovingObject', a object of type T2, which is defined at the passed instant.
        Parameters:
        instant -
        Returns:
        a object of type T2, if this 'MovingObject' is defined at the passed, otherwise the returned object will be undefined

      • getUnit

        T1 getUnit(TimeInstantIF instant)
        Get the 'UnitObject' which covers the passed instant of time in this 'MovingObject'
        Parameters:
        instant -
        Returns:
        the 'UnitObject' which covers the passed instant of time or an undefined, empty 'UnitObject' if the passed instant is not covered by any 'UnitObject'

      • getUnit

        T1 getUnit(int position)
        Returns the unit at the specified position in this 'MovingObject'.
        Parameters:
        position -
        Returns:
        the unit at the specified position in this 'MovingObject' or an undefined, empty unit if the passed position does not exists

      • getUnitPosition

        int getUnitPosition(TimeInstantIF instant)
        Get the position of the unit in the units array which contains the given instant.
        Parameters:
        instant -
        Returns:
        position of the unit in the array, -1 otherwise

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Check if this 'MovingObject' is closed, the period of the last unit is right closed.
        Returns:
        true if period of last unit is right closed, false otherwise
